TimeLedger.slogan: Tick tock, tick tock... What will you decide to do next?
TimeLedger.cancelConfirmBody: Are you sure you want to cancel the task? It will not be recoverable.
TimeLedger.timeUpBody: The countdown has finished. Do you want to continue?
TimeLedger.ifMistakenlyFinishedTooltip: If you mistakenly finished, you can return to the previous state.
TimeLedger.invalidTimeSettings: Invalid time settings. Hours must be >= 0, and minutes and seconds must be between 0 and 59.
TimeLedger.taskTitleError: Task title is not set or exceeds the limit of 50 characters.
TimeLedger.taskDescriptionError: Task description exceeds the limit of 200 characters.

notFound.pageDescription: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist.

Metadata.title: Time Ledger - SanCeltum
Metadata.description: Enhance your productivity with Time Ledger, a sophisticated Pomodoro-like timer that logs your tasks and generates detailed time receipts.
Metadata.keywords: time management, Pomodoro timer, task tracking, productivity, time ledger, time receipts, task log

openGraph.title: Time Ledger - Free-spirited Time And Task Management
openGraph.description: Whether you spend it or not, time keeps flowing. Use SanCeltum's Time Ledger to indulge freely, consciously, and enjoy every moment.
